title: チェックイン1
description: ホテルのフロントでチェックインするシーンです。
steps: Good day, welcome.
May I have your reservation name, please?
Thank you, Mr. Smith
I will proceed with the check-in process
What type of room did you book?
Okay, you booked a single room
Let me confirm your reservation details and prepare your room
For check-in, we require either a passport or identification card
Do you have it with you?
Thank you, I'll take your passport
How would you like to settle the payment?
Okay, you'll be paying with a credit card
Please present your credit card and identification when making the payment
Thank you very much
I have confirmed your payment
The check-in process is complete, and I will now provide you with your room key
The elevator is on the right
Your room is on the fourth floor, room number 412
Enjoy your stay! If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to ask
You're welcome. Have a pleasant stay!
